title: 求助~BossShopPro的附属插件ThirdCurrency如何用?
author: swy641205

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
你说这个嘛：https://www.spigotmc.org/resourc ... e-currencies.26273/ 

虽然全是英文不过他给的默认配置文件也很好懂吧
Name: Enter the name you want placeholders and rewardtype/pricetype to have here
Name: 名称
PointsPlugin: Enter the name of your economy plugin here
PointsPlugin: 经济/点卷插件名称（注意大小写）
Message.NotEnoughPoints: The message that is sent when players run out of points
Message.NotEnoughPoints: 经济/点卷不足时的系统提示
Placeholder.DisplayPoints: The text that %price% or %reward% placeholders are replaced with
Placeholder.DisplayPoints: 这就更简单了，变量呗看你需求了

'2':
  Name: tokens 
  PointsPlugin: Tokens 点卷插件名
  Message:
    NotEnoughPoints: '&c点卷不足嗨!' 提示语
  Placeholder:
    DisplayPoints: '%tokens% Tokens' = '%tokens% 点卷（token是货币/代币还是用点卷简单点）'
  PointsDisplay:
    Enabled: false
    List:
    - 1000000:6:2:%number% million
    - 1000:3:2:%number%k
    - 0:0:0:%number%复制代码

replies.author: swy641205
replies.txt_content: 不太确定那设定要放在哪 0.0

replies.author: swy641205
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2017-10-9 02:20
你说这个嘛：https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/thirdcurrency-bsp-adds-support-for-more-currencies.26 ...
我突然发现 ThirdCurrency 没有加载出config 不知为什么

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
swy641205 发表于 2017-10-10 08:30
我突然发现 ThirdCurrency 没有加载出config 不知为什么
设置是要填到 BossShopPro插件设置内，至于没有config （我没用过，可能由于是附属插件所以功能直接导入吧）
顺便说一下 最新版：v1.1.3
